title: Rename DistBackend -> Backend
body_html:
The "Dist" in "DistBackend" still is repetitive IMO. Usually this will be used as:

import torch.distributed as dist
dist.DistBackend.GLOO

We should rename s/DistBackend/Backend/. Since it is part of the distributed package, it is clear that backend implies the distributed backend. The class was only recently introduced so I'm sure there are no external users yet. Pre-1.0 is the time to make this mod. This is not directly related to this change.

cc @SsnL @teng-li @apaszke

body:
The "Dist" in "DistBackend" still is repetitive IMO. Usually this will be used as:

```python
import torch.distributed as dist
dist.DistBackend.GLOO
```

We should rename s/DistBackend/Backend/. Since it is part of the distributed package, it is clear that backend implies the distributed backend. The class was only recently introduced so I'm sure there are no external users yet. Pre-1.0 is the time to make this mod. This is not directly related to this change. 

cc @SsnL @teng-li @apaszke
